items.sentence: Aren\'t you the one who organized this party?
As I said earlier, I won\'t be here tomorrow.
To the best of my knowledge, Tom can\'t swim.
Could you tell me about Tom\'s eating habits?
Tom said some things that didn\'t make sense.
Tom sat down next to someone he didn\'t know.
If Tom starts laughing, I probably will, too.
I\'m tired of eating the same food every day.
I wonder whether Tom has ever been to Boston.
I wonder whether Tom has quit his job or not.
I wonder whether Tom is a picky eater or not.
I wonder whether or not Tom has a girlfriend.
I\'m sure I can find something for you to do.
I want to see Tom first thing in the morning.
I want to talk to you for a minute about Tom.
Tom knew that Mary was likely not to do that.
Tom knew that he was going to need some help.
Tom knocked on the door, but got no response.
Tom knocked on the door, but nobody answered.
Tom knows Mary would rather not go to Boston.
